element.name: Patient Care Report Custom Data Element Potential Values
element.definition: The values which are associated with the patient care report custom data element. Values would be the choices provided to the user when they document the custom data element.
element.v3Comment: Used to populate eCustomConfiguration.06 Custom Data Element Potential Values.
element.v3Changes: Added to allow customized data elements to be inserted and collected from within the NEMSIS Version 3 standard.

asserts.assert: Patient Care Report Custom Data Element Potential Values should be unique (the same value should not be listed more than once).
The Custom Value Description for Patient Care Report Custom Data Element Potential Values should be unique (the same description should not be listed more than once).
